title: "the login server didn't respond"
body:
it says the login server didn't respond and wants me to check my connection issues, but i have no issues, only league is having a problem. ive played a match of bf4 some pvp in ds3 and had no issues at all.
what do?

replies.body:
It usually asks you to check your connection as a default, since the server itself can't 100% determine the reason you can't connect, just that you can't connect to the login server.

I'd recommend checking out our [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944) article which should help with the most common login issues we see.  Let me know if it helps!
